quotes.quote: Let your conscience be your guide when you are lost.
Shepherds also need shepherds simply because everyone needs to be guided, maybe not always but surely one day!
My Soul is my Guide, for my Soul is of that Abode I will not Speak of the Earthly, I am of the Unknown.
Unless you learn to lead, you will always be at the mercy of someone else to guide you.
We have all a better guide in ourselves, if we would attend to it, than any other person can be.
It is reason, and not passion, which must guide our deliberations, guide our debate, and guide our decision.
Follow what you are genuinely passionate about and let that guide you to your destination.
Goals are only ever a guide; a winding, changing path. It's your heart that will really keep you on track... and nourished along the way.
When you leave the light behind you, shadows and darkness become your guide!
We are not here to curse the darkness, but to light the candle that can guide us thru that darkness to a safe and sane future.
The conscience can be a strong guide in life if we allow it.
Your goals are the road maps that guide you and show you what is possible for your life.
It is not reason which is the guide of life, but custom.
Experience is a truer guide than the words of others.
It is better to guide people than try to hammer them into a line.
The Constitution is the guide which I never will abandon.
Never go to excess, but let moderation be your guide.
Clearly the person who accepts the Church as an infallible guide will believe whatever the Church teaches.
He that takes truth for his guide, and duty for his end, may safely trust to God's providence to lead him aright.
Don't use your brain to play it, let your feelings guide your fingers.
